select o.cm_id as "cmId",c.`code` as "code",p.dealer as "dealer", p.address as "address", count(*) as "count" ,sum(o.payment_amount) as "sum" from t_order_info o , t_coffee_maker c ,t_place p where o.cm_id = c.id and p.id = c.place_id and o.`status`='1'
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{lastStatisticsTime_gte,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{lastStatisticsTime_lte,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastStatisticsTime_gte,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastStatisticsTime_lte,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY o.cm_id ORDER BY count(*) desc
